title: Disco

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Connect two wired or wireless switches, a bubble machine and disco light to an appliance controller. Or use a switch adapted bubble machine and disco light.
• Play some music and let the switch user have fun controlling lights and bubbles for the disco!

tooltipText: Use a Click-It-On (or similar) or two switch adapted toys to control lights and bubbles for a disco
